availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard J. Minish (Owen County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Louisa Rowlett Minish in Owen County, Kentucky on December 25, 1839. Father of William R. Minish, Thaddeus Warsaw Minish, John M. Minish, and Sarah F. Minish. Laborer in Owen County in 1850. Farmer in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 79.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272772, p. 95 (on microfilm), (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Richard Johnson Minish (19 Jan 1815-23 May 1898)," Memorial #25368873, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25368873 (accessed June 16, 2020).
